amenitiesDetails.description: Stainless steel deep single bowl kitchen sinks
Unprecedented location and view corridors within Arcadia
Amenity area with vaulted ceiling view of Camelback mountain
First class fitness center encompassing two rooms, including cardio equipment, free weights, and weight machines manufactured by Matrix
Unique outdoor swimming pool and hot spa
Sundeck with Janus et Cie furniture, whirlpool spa, fire pit and multiple gas fired BBQ grills; 80” TV, cabanas with daybeds, couches & outdoor games (bag toss & giant jenga)
Cyber Caf\u00e9 featuring both Apple & Microsoft computers with free printing available
Wi-Fi access in all public areas including pool
Party room with full prep kitchen and serving area; Opens to pool deck
Secured parking located under apartment units*
Convenient trash room with chute on every floor
Shaded outdoor dog park on the ground floor

firstRibbon.text: Live amidst high-quality dining, shopping, employment and outdoor recreation spots, with easy access to AZ-51 and just minutes from Camelback Mountain, Phoenix Mountains Preserve, Biltmore Quarter and Costco. Arlo is an excellent location to indulge all your recreational and professional pursuits.
